name: MyFirst2DPlatformerFullGame_2DGameKit
description:
This is the full game with my completed scene in it. I inserted my scene in between zone 4 and 5, its right after you unlock the big door with the 3 keys. I felt that was the best place to put my scene

A - Melee Attack

S - Ranged Attack

P - Pause

I - Interact

Up Arrow - Jump

Right Arrow - Move Forwards

Left Arrow - Move Backwards

Down Arrow - Crouch

Hold Down Arrow then Press and Hold Up Arrow - Fall Through Platforms
